section.title: WMI
section.para: Allows access to the Windows Management Instrumentation data, exposed by Windows systems.

sect2.title: Local/Remote Modes
sect2.para: The agent supports both local and remote modes.

sect2.title: Supported Versions
sect2.para: There is no need to specify a version for the WMI agent.

sect2.title: Configuration
sect2.para: The following configuration options are available:

itemizedlist.listitem: User name: User name valid for the remote system, or blank if not required.
Password: Password valid for the remote system, or blank if not required.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Windows Management Instrumentation data is grouped under four large categories:

itemizedlist.listitem: Hardware: contains information about the physical devices present in a computer
OS: holds information about operating system components such as drivers, users etc
Applications: contains data related to the installed applications

Performance: contains a hierarchy of performance counters exposed by Windows. Do not use the WMI agent to access this data. Instead use the Windows agent which is optimized to retrieve these performance counters.
